item.description:
There are a lot of March birthdays so that gives us more of a reason to have a Boston Frisbee party!

Everyone should come out for socializing, food and fun!

Bring a dish/dessert/beverages if you feel like it.

 

*WARNING: You may not recognize people in real clothes.
item.how_to_find_us: Take either the 77, 79 or 350 bus to her place and get off at Franklin St. We should also see if people want to do carpools - just comment on the event wall if you need a ride or can give rides! There is plenty of street parking.
item.name: Celebrate Boston Frisbee March Birthdays
